query:
SELECT 
  tentId,
  phase,
  COUNT(*) as num_weeks
FROM weeklyTargets
GROUP BY tentId, phase
ORDER BY tentId, phase;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 28MX9rHeRYrkZKS.5ffbe178d99f --database AhyBXV9CDav4cSFRqphBxc --execute SELECT 
  tentId,
  phase,
  COUNT(*) as num_weeks
FROM weeklyTargets
GROUP BY tentId, phase
ORDER BY tentId, phase;
